\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Extends the db class to perform basic database interaction. Since 99\% of all the work I do is creating the same C\-R\-U\-D stuff over and over, it became very apparent that what I needed was a simple class to do all these things rather than writing the same fucking code over and over and over and over
